LanguageData.Apparel_VestA.label: Arasaka armored vest
LanguageData.Apparel_VestA.description: Standard armor for Arasaka guards, the armored vest is designed to stop small arms fire, grenade shrapnel, but only slow up assault rifle rounds.
LanguageData.CP_AA_Jacket.label: Arasaka Armored Jacket
LanguageData.CP_AA_Jacket.description: Arasaka security force standard issue armor jacket.
LanguageData.CP_AA_Pants.label: Arasaka Armored Pants
LanguageData.CP_AA_Pants.description: Arasaka security force standard issue armor pants.
LanguageData.CP_ABodySuit.label: Arasaka jumpsuit
LanguageData.CP_ABodySuit.description: This black jumpsuit is the standard uniform for Arasaka guards.
LanguageData.CP_IECSecurity_Jacket.label: IEC Security jacket
LanguageData.CP_IECSecurity_Jacket.description: Because IEC believes in subtlety when it comes to corporate security the company's corporate guards wear these suits.
LanguageData.CP_IECSecurity_Pants.label: IEC Security Pants
LanguageData.CP_IECSecurity_Shirt.label: IEC Security shirt
LanguageData.CP_IECSecurity_Shirt.description: Standard IEC corporate guard button up shirt.
LanguageData.CP_MA_Jacket.label: Militech Combat Armor
LanguageData.CP_MA_Jacket.description: Militech security force standard issue combat armor.
LanguageData.CP_MA_Pants.label: Militech armored fatigues
LanguageData.CP_MA_Pants.description: Militech security force standard issue armored fatigues.
LanguageData.CP_MBodySuit.label: Militech jumpsuit
LanguageData.CP_MBodySuit.description: This dark grey jumpsuit is the standard uniform for Militech soldiers.

LanguageData.CP_PSecurity_Shirt.label: Petrochem Security shirt
LanguageData.CP_PSecurity_Shirt.description: Standard Petrochem corporate guard button up shirt with integrated bulletproof vest.
